pluginEnabled_tooltip: Otan einai energo, to Discord status sou tha enhmerwnetai me info opws thn twrinh pista. Otan einai anenergo, to Discord tha dixnei mono oti paizeis Beat Saber.
usePlayButtonEmoji_tooltip: Allazei to 'Playing' mhnuma sto status sou me ena play button emoji (Xrhsimo an to tragoudi exei megalo onoma).
showTimeRemaining_tooltip: Otan einai anenergo, to Discord tha dixnei ton upoloipo xrono.
showDifficulty: Deikse ton vathmo duskolias anti gia ton kalhtexnh
